title: How to get Pixel 4 XL fixed in Poland? I can't find any way to claim the problem
content:
I've been having issues with NFC for a while. Half a year ago it simply stopped working. I can't use Google Pay, and can't use any other services which require NFC. I followed all instructions on the Help Center. The issue is definitely with the hardware.

I bought the phone in Poland, and I am based in Poland. The shop where I bought it went bankrupt during the Covid pandemic, so I can't contact them anymore.

I tried finding info on how to file a claim, but all links redirect to general articles or the home page. There's no even info on the authorized services in Poland. I can't find any phone number to call. The only option is to write here.

How can I fix my phone?
